name: Mech's Mechanic
description:
Play as a mechanic, and repare a giant robot while it is moving!

Please read the controls before starting the game.

Controls MoveWASD / ZQSD / Arrow keys / Left Joystick / D-PadRepareSpace / A buttonShieldShift / B button
QuitEscape (hold)
Credits

Design, code and art by Ardos
Music by Akuro Søren

This game was made during the Potat0sJam12

The theme was "You are an ally of the hero (you don't play the hero)" and the game jam ran for 10 days.
